data.text: @HenryJKraven There is no way to know. 😢
@itwasme29 The number represents documented dead only. Probably more than 5,000,000, but then how would be find those numbers.
@BAEllison4 Appears to be for a lot of people, and there is a lot of anti-vaxxers, maybe the same people?
@HenryJKraven I would have to say: it's about as blas√© as mass-shootns

@PellinoreWendy Some people actually believe it is over! It ain't gonna be over til Dr. Fauci says it's over, and that may never happen! Some people actually think they know more about Covid than the experts, while in truth another deadlier virus could emerge before this one is gone, if ever.
@HenryJKraven For some it has but for me well I just think of the 5,000,000 + who have a broken heart from the loss of their loved one. 😢 That number is way short.
@HenryJKraven Apparently it's no big deal, or it was a hoax, or yeah but now it's all over.
